title: Spectre Shield Screen Protector for Samsung Galaxy Alpha Screen Protector Case Friendly Accessories Flexible Full Coverage Clear TPU Film
features: SPECTRE SHIELD Galaxy Alpha Screen Protector is your "virtually invisible" screen protection solution from unwanted and accidental scratches or damage!

COMPATIBLE with most Samsung Galaxy Alpha cases - Protect your Samsung Galaxy Alpha screen from scratches, wear/tear, and dirt with this unique proprietary skin film material; Laser-cut precision to ensure perfect fitment
A MUST HAVE of Samsung Galaxy Alpha accessories - High definition transparency film ensures your phone screen stays sharp with vibrant colors
PLEASE NOTE: This product is not a tempered glass screen protector, but rather a "wet install" film which allows multiple adjustments during the install process
INCLUDES: Lifetime Replacements voucher to cover film replacements for the life of your device!
description: ." - Great way to preserve the resale or trade-in value of your device - Laser-cut for perfect fitment and compatibility with most cases- A great alternative for non-flexible tempered glass screen protectors - Rated as one of the most essential accessories for your brand new device
Why Do You Need A Screen Protector?

It is extremely common for electronic devices to get damaged. Just check out these statistics:45% of consumers will damage their device during its life 38% will drop their device from their hand 28% will drop their device in liquid  15% will suffer damage from falling off their lap

Spectre Shield Screen Protectors are military-grade clear film precisely made for your wearable or phone devices, designed to provide maximum protection for your screen that goes on virtually invisible. Invisible & HD Clear - Made with durability and visibility in mind. Advanced optical material is used to ensure you get the highest visibility on your screen. Error-Free Installation - Our film is installed via "wet method" allowing multiple chances to align the film and even wash off dirt if needed during installation. Leaves no sticky residue.
